channel.title: CVE Feed for Ninja Team -- Ninja Beaver Add-ons for Beaver Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ninja Team -- Ninja Beaver Add-ons for Beaver Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-37244|2024-07-22T09:13:18.142Z -- ninja%20team -- ninja%20beaver%20add-ons%20for%20beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ninja Team Ninja Beaver Add-ons for Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ninja Beaver Add-ons for Beaver Builder: from n/a through 2.4.5.
